review: Great product.  It does what expected but just a couple of things.1. The remote is useless if you do not have direct access to the stick.  The phone app works awesome.2. Use the power outlet like the directions state.3. If you have multiple Wi-Fi users, make sure you have plenty of speed or things will get choppy.Because  of this product, I have lowered our ATT TV bill $90.00 a month. I love Amazon, but they should give a loyalty discount long term membership.

review: I turned my nice but not so smart new TV into a smart TV in literally less than 5 minutes. I love my Fire TV Stick! Quick to set up, quick to use, was binge-watching Netflix within 10 minutes. There have been no connectivity issues and no lag in streaming speeds as some reviewers had stated.
